alert.note: Alert for Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 2:59PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Broome, southeastern Tioga and northern Susquehanna Counties through 345 PM EST... At 259 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Corners, or over Endicott, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Binghamton, Vestal, Johnson City, Endicott, Kirkwood, Conklin, Maine, Owego, Sanford and Susquehanna. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 1 and 6. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 64 and 82. Interstate 88 between 1 and 3. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 near 230. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
